actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to remove certain lands from the Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge, Oklahoma.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands and waters in the Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge, Oklahoma, to the Wichita Mountains Association for public recreational and cultural activities. Reverts the title to such lands to the United States in the event that the lands are no longer used for such purposes.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain lands from the Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge, Oklahoma.
